content: this modern blanket is fun to make and will be a great staple on your lounge or snuggled up with bub it features an easy all-over triangle pattern and simple garter stitch border make it in a bright colour for a blanket that is fun and playful or choose a classic neutral for something stylish and chic it is easy to knit with it s simple knit-purl pattern and your stitches will fly off the needles as you finish each triangle repeat and in 3 sizes you can make a small baby blanket for a special loved one or wrap yourself in a big cozy throw **sizes ** baby lap throw **dimensions ** 66cm x 81cm 109cm x 117cm 138cm x 152cm **yarn ** woolly 8ply by woolly yarn co 104m/50g **quantity ** 7 balls 17 balls 28 balls or 728 1768 2912 m **needle ** 4mm circular needle 80-120cm depending on size **gauge ** 19 5sts x 34rows to 10cm in pattern **materials ** 2 stitch markers yarn needle
